page.title: 19FIT, HEALTHY AND HAPPY
page.content: Most residents are registered with one of the two{doctors surgeries}in the area. There is also a child's clinic and a slimming clinic. A visit to Brentwood is necessary for hospitals or dentists. Many people enjoy{sporting activities; Doddinghurst Olympic is a large soccer club for boys and there are local clubs for badminton, tennis, karate, judo and dancing. Nearby, Ongar Sports Centre and Bishops Hall, Brentwood, provide facilities for a wide range of physical activities. Most families are prepared to drive to leisure areas, the favourite being {South Weald Park.}Popular pubs were those which offered food, friendliness and a garden for children and included {The Moat, The Eagle}and{The Shepherd locally and many other pubs, clubs and restaurants farther away.
